name: Unus Annus: The Grandma's Recipe
description:
The Grandma's Recipe is a mini-game, created to support Unus Annus YouTube channel and it is based on one of its videos. Subscribe to Unus Annus and join the cult today! 

Warning: the game may (though shouldn't) be inappropriate for kids.
Warning: HTML version may not work as expected (for example, links won't open).

How, why and what for was it created?

If you think that this is an interesting idea, please help me make it real. Share the word and make a post with the link to this game in any social media. Thank you so much in advance! ^_^

Links you may be interested in:
- Unus Annus (YouTube channel);
- Khud0 (Art, Code, SFX, etc.);
- Hyp3rsleep (Gorgeous Soundtracks);
